===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|architecture}} [[palace]]
# {{lb|zh|architecture|religion}} [[temple]]
# {{lb|zh|anatomy}} [[womb]]; [[uterus]]
#: {{zh-x|子宮|uterus, womb}}
#: {{zh-x|宮頸|cervix}}
# {{lb|zh|music}} The [[first]] [[note]] of the [[Chinese]] [[pentatonic]] [[scale]]
# {{lb|zh|historical|_|law}} [[castration]] as a [[punishment]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

====Usage notes====
In reference to temples, 宮 ("palace") is used for {{w|Chinese folk religion|traditional deities}} considered to rank highly in the celestial bureaucracy, such as {{w|Mazu}} who was honored by the {{w|Qing dynasty}} as the "Queen of Heaven" after their successful {{w|Qing conquest of Taiwan|invasion of Taiwan}}.

====Hypernyms====
* {{sense|historical punishment}} {{zh-l|五刑}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|temple}} '''See''' {{l-zh|廟}}

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|みや}}
{{IPAchar|/mi<sub>1</sub>ya/}} → {{IPAchar|/miya/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=みや}}. A compound of {{m|ja|神}} or {{compound|lang=ja|sort=みや|御|tr1=mi|t1=spiritual honorific|屋|tr2=ya|t2=house}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|みや|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|みや}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=みや|Shinto}} the place where a god resides: a [[shrine]]
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|413}}<ref name="NJ">{{R:Nippo Jisho}}</ref>
#*: '''Miya'''. ミヤ (宮) 神 (Camis)の社.
# {{lb|ja|sort=みや|Buddhism}} a [[temple]] holding a Buddhist statue
# the place where a ruler resides: a [[palace]]
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|413}}<ref name="NJ"/>
#*: '''Miya'''. ミヤ (宮) 国王の子. また, 国王の宮殿
# a member of the imperial family
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|413}}<ref name="NJ"/>
#*: '''Miya'''. ミヤ (宮) 国王の子. また, 国王の宮殿

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|みや|proper}}

# {{surname|lang=ja|sort=みや}}
# an old name for a region in the Atsuta area of {{w|Nagoya}}, {{w|Aichi prefecture}}, where the {{w|Atsuta Shrine}} is located

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|きゅう}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=きゅう}} {{m|zh|宮|tr=kjuwng||dwelling; palace; note on a scale}}. Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} reading ''kiong''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|きゅう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|きゅう}}

# a [[palace]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=きゅう|traditional|_|music|_|of China and Japan}} the [[keynote]] or [[tonic]] of a [[musical]] [[scale]], such as {{m|en|do}} in the {{m|en|do}} {{m|en|re}} {{m|en|mi}} scale notation of [[solfège]]
# {{contraction of|lang=ja|sort=きゅう|宮刑|nodot=1}}: literally “palace punishment”, this consisted of [[castration]] for men and [[sequestration]] in the [[palace]] for women
# {{lb|ja|sort=きゅう|astronomy|astrology}} a [[zodiac]] [[sign]] or [[house]], defined as one-twelfth of the circle of the [[ecliptic]]
#: {{ja-usex|黄道十二'''宮'''、宝瓶'''宮'''|おうどう じゅうに '''きゅう'''、 ほうへい '''きゅう'''|the twelve '''signs''' of the zodiac, the '''house''' of Aquarius}}
